title: ARM compile broken by amd64 registers
body:
by **kai.backman2**: 
from cayle.graumann@gmail.com:
    I'm trying to compile the go compilers under scratchbox to run on
the Nokia N900 using the latest code from mercurial.  I am getting
redefinition errors for the AMD64 Registers when it tries to compile
the 8db.c file.
The included file that defines the registers is /usr/include/sys/
ucontext.h.  The definitions in question are R0,R1,R8-R15.  I am
compiling with the all-arm.bash script.

Is there a way to only compile the arm compiler suite in an arm
environment, as it seems unlikely that one would cross compile for
i386 or amd64 on the N900?
